name: Follow the Leader (Dreamluigi)
description:
Name: Follow the Leader

Genre: Platformer
No. of players: 1
Controller Support: XBOX 360/One Controller
Game Engine: Game Maker Studio 2
Development Software: Adobe Photoshop
Screen Resolution (Window Size): 960 x 540

Objective: Dodge various obstacles until you reach the end.

If one of the players (leader) gets hit, he’s out for the entire game. Lose all three, and you get game over.

There are three types of players:
Slider: He can slide through small corners.
Jumper: He can jump really high.
Puncher: He can punch obstacles (e.g. boxes, steel boxes).

Controls:
A button: Jump
X button: Slide (Slider), High Jump (Jumper), Punch (Puncher)
Y button: Switch leader

Instructions: Extract the zip file, and run the executable.

Team Name: The Chillenials

Diamonick (Programmer)

Jalon (Artist)

Kayvon (Artist)

Milad (Artist)
